title: Supply curve graph for unique Etruscan vase

content.question: If a one-of-a-kind Etruscan vase is offered for sale at an auction, which, if any, of the following correctly shows the supply curve for the vase?

choices.label: Choice A is a graph with price on the vertical axis and quantity on the horizontal axis, and a line plotted labeled supply. Choice A has a vertical line plotted beginning near the center of the horizontal axis.

Choice B is a graph with price on the vertical axis and quantity on the horizontal axis, and a line plotted labeled supply. Choice B has a horizontal line plotted beginning near the center of the vertical axis.

Choice C is a graph with price on the vertical axis and quantity on the horizontal axis, and a line plotted labeled supply. Choice C has a line that starts at the origin and increases linearly to the right.

Choice D is a graph with price on the vertical axis and quantity on the horizontal axis, and a line plotted labeled supply. Choice D has a line that starts near the top of the vertical axis and decreases linearly to the right.
It is impossible to determine the shape of the supply curve from the given information.

content.answer: Choice A is a graph with price on the vertical axis and quantity on the horizontal axis, and a line plotted labeled supply. Choice A has a vertical line plotted beginning near the center of the horizontal axis.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
